name: russet

having a reddish-brown colour: The last of the russet leaves were clinging to the trees. They asked the public to report any sightings of the russet-coloured creatures.
More examplesFewer examplesThe leaves on the vines are russet reds and oranges. The brick walls have that marvellous russet colour that comes with great age. Her gown was russet brown.
